section.name: Metafacades Descriptor Schema
section.p: Each Metafacades descriptor (andromda-metafacades.xml) must comply with the following XSD Schema:
section.source:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <!-- Used for mapping contexts. An example for a context is: An entity is a context for its attributes. So, the metaclass "Attribute" would be mapped to the class for "EntityAttributeFacade" if the Attribute belongs to an entity. If the Attribute belongs to any other Classifier, it would be mapped to a simple "AttributeFacade" and therefore would NOT need the context --> <xs:element name="context" type="xs:string"/> <!-- specifies the default metafacade (if a metafacade is not explicitly defined for an element this will be used instead) --> <xs:element name="default"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="className" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="metafacade"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="stereotype" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="context" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="property" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="metaobjectClass" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="metafacadeClass" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="metafacades"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="property" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element ref="default" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="metafacade" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> <!-- each grouping of metafacades is identified by this namespaces --> <xs:attribute name="namespace" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!-- property references are properties you wish to configure on a metafacade, through bean properties --> <xs:element name="property"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="reference" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="stereotype" type="xs:string"/> </xs:schema>
